document.full_text: american international group and thetreasury on wednesday said they will sell around $9 billion in aig stock, but sources familiar with the situation said the treasury would pull the sale if it cannot be done profitably.
document.title: aig's $9 billion offering could be pulled: sources
lines_and_colors: american international group and thetreasury on wednesday said they will sell around $9 billion in aig stock, but sources familiar with the situation said the treasury would pull the sale if it cannot be done profitably.
